mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board b JOIN ptboardinfo p ON b.brdno = p.brdno WHERE b.brdtype='pt' order by b.brdno desc limit #{value}, 10
select count(*) from board where board.brdtype='pt'
select b.brdno, b.brdcontent, b.wrdate, b.userid, b.title, b.brdtype, b.userno, p.ptbrdno from board b join ptboardinfo p on b.brdno=p.brdno where brdtype='pt' order by p.ptbrdno desc
select b.title, b.userid, b.wrdate, b.brdcontent, p.worktype, p.workloc, p.workhour, p.ptbrdno from board b join ptboardinfo p on b.brdno=p.brdno where p.ptbrdno=#{num}
select brdno from ptboardinfo where ptbrdno=#{int}
